description: This file is a PHP source code that generates an HTML page with embedded JavaScript for configuring Dynamic DNS settings in a web interface. It includes external PHP headers and other PHP includes, contains JavaScript for form handling, AJAX requests, and dynamic DOM manipulation, and has HTML form elements for user input.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Dynamically adds a new Host Name input field and a Remove button to the form.

methods.name: add1
methods.description: Removes specific Host Name input fields and related elements from the form.
